quote_list.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quote_list.author: C.S. Lewis

quote_list.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quote_list.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote_list.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quote_list.author: Nelson Mandela

quote_list.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quote_list.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote_list.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quote_list.author: Confucius

quote_list.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quote_list.author: C.S. Lewis

quote_list.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quote_list.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote_list.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quote_list.author: Nelson Mandela

quote_list.quote: Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it.
quote_list.author: Albert Einstein

quote_list.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quote_list.author: Lao Tzu

quote_list.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quote_list.author: Abraham Lincoln

quote_list.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quote_list.author: John Lennon

quote_list.author: me

quote_list.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quote_list.author: Steve Jobs

quote_list.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quote_list.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote_list.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quote_list.author: Albert Einstein

quote_list.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quote_list.author: Winston Churchill

quote_list.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quote_list.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote_list.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quote_list.author: Aristotle

quote_list.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quote_list.author: Audrey Hepburn

quote_list.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quote_list.author: Lao Tzu

quote_list.quote: Where there is love there is life.
quote_list.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote_list.quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
quote_list.author: Loretta Young

quote_list.quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
quote_list.author: William Shakespeare

quote_list.quote: I'm a wild and crazy guy ----
quote_list.author: Steve Martin
